title: Footnotes in shortcodes

content:
This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 MST<html lang="en-PH">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05+08:00expected: 2006-01-02 15:04 PSToutput:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 +0800time.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 +0800Extra test: 2006-01-02 15:04Z07:00<html lang="en-PH">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05+08:00expected: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00output:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00time.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00
summary: This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
title: EN-PH: timezone abbr with offset

content:
This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 MST<html lang="en-PH">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05expected: 2006-01-02 15:04 PSToutput:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 PSTtime.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04 +0800Extra test: 2006-01-02 15:04Z07:00<html lang="en-PH">frontmatter: 2006-01-02T15:04:05expected: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00output:.Date.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00time.Format: 2006-01-02 15:04+08:00
summary: This page displays the output of .Date.Format and time.Format depending on the format chosen.
title: EN-PH: timezone abbr without offset
